-- -- Id : SelectCodeClass -- Version : 00001 SELECT CC.CODECLASSID , DK.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODECLASSNAME$$KO-KR" , DE.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODECLASSNAME$$EN-US" , DC.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODECLASSNAME$$JA-JP" , DV.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODECLASSNAME$$VI-VN" , CC.DESCRIPTION , CC.CODECLASSTYPE , CC.PARENTCODECLASSID , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , CC.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , CC.MODIFIEDTIME , CC.VALIDSTATE FROM SF_CODECLASS CC LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DK ON CC.DICTIONARYID = DK.DICTIONARYID AND DK.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ko-KR' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DE ON CC.DICTIONARYID = DE.DICTIONARYID AND DE.LANGUAGETYPE = 'en-US' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DC ON CC.DICTIONARYID = DC.DICTIONARYID AND DC.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ja-JP' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DV ON CC.DICTIONARYID = DV.DICTIONARYID AND DV.LANGUAGETYPE = 'vi-VN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON CC.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON CC.MODIFIER = UM.USERID WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND CC.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end
#if ("$!{P_CODECLASSTYPE}" != "*") AND CC.CODECLASSTYPE = '$!{P_CODECLASSTYPE}' #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (CC.CODECLASSID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CC.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CC.PARENTCODECLASSID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "CODECLASSID") AND CC.CODECLASSID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "CODECLASSNAME") AND (DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "DESCRIPTION") AND CC.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "PARENTCODECLASSID") AND CC.PARENTCODECLASSID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectCodeClassSearch -- Version : 00001 SELECT DISTINCT CC.PARENTCODECLASSID , CC.CODECLASSID , CCD.DICTIONARYNAME AS CODECLASSNAME FROM SF_CODE C RIGHT OUTER JOIN SF_CODECLASS CC ON C.CODECLASSID = CC.CODECLASSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY CCD ON CC.DICTIONARYID = CCD.DICTIONARYID AND CCD.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY CD ON C.DICTIONARYID = CD.DICTIONARYID AND CD.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE 1 = 1 AND CC.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND (C.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' OR C.VALIDSTATE IS NULL) #end
#if ("$!{P_CODECLASSID}" != "") AND C.CODECLASSID = '$!{P_CODECLASSID}' #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (C.CODEID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CD.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR C.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "CODEID") AND C.CODEID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "CODENAME") AND CD.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "DESCRIPTION") AND C.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectCode -- Version : 00001 SELECT CC.PARENTCODECLASSID , C.CODECLASSID , C.CODEID , DK.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODENAME$$KO-KR" , DE.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODENAME$$EN-US" , DC.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODENAME$$JA-JP" , DV.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CODENAME$$VI-VN" , C.DESCRIPTION , C.DISPLAYSEQUENCE , C.PARENTCODEID , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , C.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , C.MODIFIEDTIME , C.VALIDSTATE FROM SF_CODE C LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DK ON C.DICTIONARYID = DK.DICTIONARYID AND DK.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ko-KR' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DE ON C.DICTIONARYID = DE.DICTIONARYID AND DE.LANGUAGETYPE = 'en-US' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DC ON C.DICTIONARYID = DC.DICTIONARYID AND DC.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ja-JP' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DV ON C.DICTIONARYID = DV.DICTIONARYID AND DV.LANGUAGETYPE = 'vi-VN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON C.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON C.MODIFIER = UM.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_CODECLASS CC ON C.CODECLASSID = CC.CODECLASSID WHERE 1 = 1
#if ("$!{P_CODECLASSID}" != "") AND C.CODECLASSID = '$!{P_CODECLASSID}' #end

-- -- Id : SelectConditionItem -- Version : 00001 SELECT CI.UIID , CI.CONDITIONITEMID , DK.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CONDITIONITEMNAME$$KO-KR" , DE.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CONDITIONITEMNAME$$EN-US" , DC.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CONDITIONITEMNAME$$JA-JP" , DV.DICTIONARYNAME AS "CONDITIONITEMNAME$$VI-VN" , CI.DESCRIPTION , CI.COLUMNNAME , CI.ITEMTYPE , CI.DATAFORMAT , CI.DEFAULTVALUE , CI.CONSTANTDATA , CI.ISREQUIRED , CI.ISHIDDEN , CI.ISALL , CI.EXECUTETYPE , CI.EXECUTEID , CI.EXECUTEVERSION , CI.EXECUTEPARAMETER , CI.DISPLAYMEMBER , CI.VALUEMEMBER , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , CI.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , CI.MODIFIEDTIME , CI.VALIDSTATE FROM SF_UICONDITEM CI LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DK ON CI.DICTIONARYID = DK.DICTIONARYID AND DK.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ko-KR' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DE ON CI.DICTIONARYID = DE.DICTIONARYID AND DE.LANGUAGETYPE = 'en-US' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DC ON CI.DICTIONARYID = DC.DICTIONARYID AND DC.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ja-JP' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DV ON CI.DICTIONARYID = DV.DICTIONARYID AND DV.LANGUAGETYPE = 'vi-VN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON CI.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON CI.MODIFIER = UM.USERID WHERE 1 = 1 AND CI.UIID = 'MES' #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND CI.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end
#if ("$!{P_ITEMTYPE}" != "" && "$!{P_ITEMTYPE}" != "*") AND CI.ITEMTYPE = '$!{P_ITEMTYPE}' #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDALLCOND}" == "*") AND (CI.CONDITIONITEMID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CI.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDALLCOND}" == "CONDITIONITEMID") AND CI.CONDITIONITEMID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDALLCOND}" == "CONDITIONITEMNAME") AND (DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #elseif ("$!{P_CONDALLCOND}" == "DESCRIPTION") AND CI.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectConnectionHistory -- Version : 10001 SELECT CH.TXNHISTKEY , CH.USERID , U.USERNAME , CH.CONNECTIONTYPE , CH.UIID , CH.MENUID , MN.DICTIONARYNAME AS MENUNAME , CH.IPADDRESS , CH.CONNECTIONTIME , CH.DISCONNECTIONTIME FROM SF_CONNECTIONHISTORY CH LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER U ON CH.USERID = U.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_MENU M ON CH.UIID = M.UIID AND CH.MENUID = M.MENUID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY MN ON M.DICTIONARYID = MN.DICTIONARYID AND MN.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE 1 = 1 AND CH.CONNECTIONTIME BETWEEN '$!{P_PERIOD_PERIODFR}' AND '$!{P_PERIOD_PERIODTO}'
#if ("$!{P_CONNECTIONTYPE}" != "*") AND CH.CONNECTIONTYPE = '$!{P_CONNECTIONTYPE}' #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (CH.USERID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR U.USERNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CH.UIID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CH.MENUID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR MN.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "USERNAME") AND U.USERNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "MENUNAME") AND MN.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #else AND CH.$!{P_CONDITIONITEM} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectDictionaryClassOnMapping -- Version : 10001 SELECT DC.DICTIONARYCLASSID , DCN.DICTIONARYNAME AS DICTIONARYCLASSNAME FROM SF_DICTIONARYCLASS DC LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DCN ON DC.DICTIONARYID = DCN.DICTIONARYID AND DCN.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND DC.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end /* AND DC.DICTIONARYCLASSID IN ( SELECT DM.DICTIONARYCLASSID FROM SF_DICTIONARY DM WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND DM.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (DM.DICTIONARYID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DM.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DM.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else AND DM.$!{P_CONDITIONITEM} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end ) */

-- -- Id : SelectDictionary -- Version : 10001 SELECT D.DICTIONARYCLASSID , D.DICTIONARYID , DK.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYNAME$$KO-KR" , DE.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYNAME$$EN-US" , DC.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYNAME$$JA-JP" , DV.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYNAME$$VI-VN" , D.DESCRIPTION , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , MAX(D.CREATEDTIME) AS CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , MAX(D.MODIFIEDTIME) AS MODIFIEDTIME , D.VALIDSTATE FROM SF_DICTIONARY D LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DK ON D.DICTIONARYID = DK.DICTIONARYID AND DK.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ko-KR' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DE ON D.DICTIONARYID = DE.DICTIONARYID AND DE.LANGUAGETYPE = 'en-US' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DC ON D.DICTIONARYID = DC.DICTIONARYID AND DC.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ja-JP' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DV ON D.DICTIONARYID = DV.DICTIONARYID AND DV.LANGUAGETYPE = 'vi-VN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON D.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON D.MODIFIER = UM.USERID WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND D.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end AND D.DICTIONARYCLASSID = '$!{P_DICTIONARYCLASSID}'
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (D.DICTIONARYID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR D.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "DICTIONARYNAME") AND (DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else AND D.$!{P_CONDITIONITEM} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end AND D.LANGUAGETYPE <> 'vi-VN'
GROUP BY D.DICTIONARYCLASSID ,D.DICTIONARYID ,DK.DICTIONARYNAME ,DE.DICTIONARYNAME ,DC.DICTIONARYNAME ,DV.DICTIONARYNAME ,D.DESCRIPTION ,UC.USERNAME ,UM.USERNAME ,D.VALIDSTATE

-- -- Id : SelectDictionaryClass -- Version : 10001 SELECT DC.DICTIONARYCLASSID , DCK.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYCLASSNAME$$KO-KR" , DCE.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYCLASSNAME$$EN-US" , DCC.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYCLASSNAME$$JA-JP" , DCV.DICTIONARYNAME AS "DICTIONARYCLASSNAME$$VI-VN" , DC.DESCRIPTION , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , DC.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , DC.MODIFIEDTIME , DC.VALIDSTATE FROM SF_DICTIONARYCLASS DC LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DCK ON DC.DICTIONARYID = DCK.DICTIONARYID AND DCK.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ko-KR' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DCE ON DC.DICTIONARYID = DCE.DICTIONARYID AND DCE.LANGUAGETYPE = 'en-US' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DCC ON DC.DICTIONARYID = DCC.DICTIONARYID AND DCC.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ja-JP' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DCV ON DC.DICTIONARYID = DCV.DICTIONARYID AND DCV.LANGUAGETYPE = 'vi-VN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON DC.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON DC.MODIFIER = UM.USERID WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND DC.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (DC.DICTIONARYCLASSID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "DICTIONARYCLASSNAME") AND (DCK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DCV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else AND DC.$!{P_CONDITIONITEM} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectMenuGrid -- Version : 10001 SELECT M.UIID , M.MENUID , DK.DICTIONARYNAME AS "MENUNAME$$KO-KR" , DE.DICTIONARYNAME AS "MENUNAME$$EN-US" , DC.DICTIONARYNAME AS "MENUNAME$$JA-JP" , DV.DICTIONARYNAME AS "MENUNAME$$VI-VN" , M.DESCRIPTION , M.PARENTMENUID , M.DISPLAYSEQUENCE , M.PROGRAMID , M.MENUTYPE , M.VALIDSTATE , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , M.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , M.MODIFIEDTIME FROM SF_MENU M LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DK ON M.DICTIONARYID = DK.DICTIONARYID AND DK.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ko-KR' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DE ON M.DICTIONARYID = DE.DICTIONARYID AND DE.LANGUAGETYPE = 'en-US' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DC ON M.DICTIONARYID = DC.DICTIONARYID AND DC.LANGUAGETYPE = 'ja-JP' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY DV ON M.DICTIONARYID = DV.DICTIONARYID AND DV.LANGUAGETYPE = 'vi-VN' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON M.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON M.MODIFIER = UM.USERID WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.UIID = 'MES' #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND M.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end
#if ($!{P_MENUID.length()} > 0) #if ("$!{P_MENUID}" != "*") AND M.PARENTMENUID = '$!{P_MENUID}' #else AND ISNULL(M.PARENTMENUID, '') = '' #end #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (M.MENUID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR M.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "MENUNAME") AND (DK.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DE.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DC.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR DV.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else AND M.$!{P_CONDITIONITEM} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectMenuTree -- Version : 10001 WITH TEMP AS ( SELECT M.MENUID , M.DICTIONARYID , M.DESCRIPTION , M.PARENTMENUID , M.DISPLAYSEQUENCE , M.PROGRAMID , M.MENUTYPE , M.VALIDSTATE , '/' + CONVERT(varchar, M.DISPLAYSEQUENCE) AS SORT FROM SF_MENU M WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.UIID = 'MES'
#if ($!{P_MENUID.length()} > 0) #if ("$!{P_MENUID}" != "*") AND M.MENUID = '$!{P_MENUID}' #else AND ISNULL(M.PARENTMENUID, '') = '' #end #end
UNION ALL SELECT M.MENUID , M.DICTIONARYID , M.DESCRIPTION , M.PARENTMENUID , M.DISPLAYSEQUENCE , M.PROGRAMID , M.MENUTYPE , M.VALIDSTATE , '/' + CONVERT(varchar, M.DISPLAYSEQUENCE) AS SORT FROM SF_MENU M INNER JOIN TEMP T ON T.MENUID = M.PARENTMENUID AND M.VALIDSTATE = 'Valid' WHERE 1 = 1 AND M.UIID = 'MES' ) SELECT M.MENUID --, M.MENUNAME , ISNULL(MN.DICTIONARYNAME, '') AS MENUNAME , M.PARENTMENUID , M.DISPLAYSEQUENCE , M.MENUTYPE , M.VALIDSTATE , M.MENUID AS MENUID_COPY FROM TEMP M LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY MN ON M.DICTIONARYID = MN.DICTIONARYID AND MN.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' ORDER BY M.SORT

-- -- Id : SelectMenuAuthority -- Version : 10001 SELECT COALESCE(MA.UIID, 'MES') AS UIID , UCS.USERCLASSID , MA.MENUID , UCS.DESCRIPTION , UCS.VALIDSTATE , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , UCS.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , UCS.MODIFIEDTIME , CONVERT(BIT, CASE WHEN MA.USERCLASSID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) AS ACTIVATED FROM SF_USERCLASS UCS LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_MENUAUTHORITY MA ON UCS.USERCLASSID = MA.USERCLASSID AND MA.MENUID = '$!{P_MENUID}' AND MA.UIID = 'MES' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON UCS.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON UCS.MODIFIER = UM.USERID

-- -- Id : SelectMenuConditionItemNotMapping -- Version : 10001 SELECT '$!{P_UIID}' AS UIID , '$!{P_MENUID}' AS MENUID , C.CONDITIONITEMID , CN.DICTIONARYNAME AS CONDITIONITEMNAME , 'ITEM' AS CONDITIONTYPE , NULL AS DISPLAYSEQUENCE , '' AS VALIDSTATE , '' AS RELATIONCOLUMNSTACK , C.DESCRIPTION , C.COLUMNNAME , C.ITEMTYPE , C.DATAFORMAT , C.DEFAULTVALUE , C.ISREQUIRED , C.ISHIDDEN , C.ISALL , C.EXECUTETYPE FROM SF_UICONDITEM C LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_UIMENUCONDITEMMAP MCM ON C.CONDITIONITEMID = MCM.CONDITIONITEMID AND C.UIID = MCM.UIID AND MCM.MENUID = '$!{P_MENUID}' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY CN ON C.DICTIONARYID = CN.DICTIONARYID AND CN.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE 1 = 1 AND MCM.CONDITIONITEMID IS NULL AND C.UIID = '$!{P_UIID}' AND C.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}'
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDALLCOND}" == "*") AND (C.CONDITIONITEMID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR CN.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDALLCOND}" == "CONDITIONITEMNAME") AND CN.DICTIONARYNAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #else AND C.$!{P_CONDALLCOND} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectMenuConditionItemMapping -- Version : 10001 SELECT MCM.UIID , MCM.MENUID , MCM.CONDITIONITEMID , CN.DICTIONARYNAME AS CONDITIONITEMNAME , MCM.CONDITIONTYPE , MCM.DISPLAYSEQUENCE , MCM.VALIDSTATE , MCM.RELATIONCOLUMNSTACK , C.DESCRIPTION , C.COLUMNNAME , C.ITEMTYPE , C.DATAFORMAT , C.DEFAULTVALUE , C.ISREQUIRED , C.ISHIDDEN , C.ISALL , C.EXECUTETYPE FROM SF_UIMENUCONDITEMMAP MCM LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_UICONDITEM C ON MCM.CONDITIONITEMID = C.CONDITIONITEMID AND MCM.UIID = C.UIID AND C.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY CN ON C.DICTIONARYID = CN.DICTIONARYID AND CN.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE MCM.MENUID = '$!{P_MENUID}' AND MCM.UIID = '$!{P_UIID}' AND MCM.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}'

-- -- Id : SelectMessageClassOnMapping -- Version : 10001 SELECT DISTINCT MC.MESSAGECLASSID , MCN.DICTIONARYNAME AS MESSAGECLASSNAME FROM SF_MESSAGE M RIGHT OUTER JOIN SF_MESSAGECLASS MC ON M.MESSAGECLASSID = MC.MESSAGECLASSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_DICTIONARY MCN ON MC.DICTIONARYID = MCN.DICTIONARYID AND MCN.LANGUAGETYPE = '$!{P_LANGUAGETYPE}' WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND M.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' AND (M.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' OR M.VALIDSTATE IS NULL) #end
#if ("$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}" != "") #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "*") AND (M.MESSAGEID LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR M.MESSAGENAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' OR M.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%') #else #if ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "TITLE") AND M.MESSAGENAME LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #elseif ("$!{P_CONDITIONITEM}" == "MESSAGENAME") AND M.DESCRIPTION LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #else AND M.$!{P_CONDITIONITEM} LIKE '%$!{P_CONDITIONVALUE}%' #end #end #end

-- -- Id : SelectMessage -- Version : 10001 SELECT M.MESSAGEID , M.MESSAGENAME AS TITLE , M.DESCRIPTION AS MESSAGENAME , M.LANGUAGETYPE , M.MESSAGECLASSID , M.VALIDSTATE , UC.USERNAME AS CREATOR , M.CREATEDTIME , UM.USERNAME AS MODIFIER , M.MODIFIEDTIME FROM SF_MESSAGE M LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UC ON M.CREATOR = UC.USERID LEFT OUTER JOIN SF_USER UM ON M.MODIFIER = UM.USERID WHERE 1 = 1 #if ("$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "" && "$!{P_VALIDSTATE}" != "*") AND M.VALIDSTATE = '$!{P_VALIDSTATE}' #end AND M.MESSAGECLASSID = '$!{P_MESSAGECLASSID}'
